name: Duckblade
description:
Duckblade is an offbeat adventure platformer. Create platforms with your blade as you overcome obstacles and fight your way through dozens of unique levels.

- Platformer with story, puzzle, and action elements.
- Create platforms and use powers over four distinct worlds.
- Enjoy the story and detours or skip straight to the action.

Duckblade features approximately two hours of content including story, main gameplay, and optional bonus gameplay. 

Remember - many have perished, but you are The One!

Created by George Jane and Emily Moon Moreno
Published by Emily Moon Moreno
Contact us: moonjanegames@gmail.com
Visit us on YouTube: moonjane games
